text: The Usos (born August 22, 1985) were a professional wrestling tag team consisting of fraternal twin brothers Jimmy and Jey Uso. They are signed to WWE. As of , Jey performs on the Raw brand, while Jimmy performs on the SmackDown brand. In WWE they are eight-time Tag team champions (three-time Raw Tag Team Champions and five-time SmackDown Tag Team Champions). Their fifth reign as SmackDown Tag Team Champions is the longest tag team championship reign in the company at 622 days. Jimmy (real name Jonathan Solofa Fatu) and Jey (real name Joshua Samuel Fatu) are the twin sons of Solofa Fatu, better known as Rikishi, and are part of the Anoa'i family. They were members of the family's stable The Bloodline. Their younger brother Joseph Yokozuna also works in WWE as Solo Sikoa. ==In wrestling== *Finishing moves **Double diving splash **1D (for One and Done) *Signature moves **Assisted Samoan drop **Double Superkick *Managers **Tamina Snuka **Naomi == Championships and accomplishments == * CBS Sports ** Feud of the Year (2020) ** Tag Team of the Year (2018) * ESPN ** Best Storyline of the Year (2022) – ** Best Storyline of the Year (2023) – ** Tag Team of the Year (2022) * Florida Championship Wrestling ** FCW Florida Tag Team Championship (1 time) * New York Post ** Storyline of the Year (2022) – ** Storyline of the year (2023) * Pro Wrestling Illustrated ** Faction of the Year (2022) – with The Bloodline ** Tag Team of the Year (2014) ** Ranked Jimmy No. 25 of the top 500 singles wrestlers in the PWI 500 in 2014 ** Ranked Jey No. 26 of the top 500 singles wrestlers in the PWI 500 in 2014 ** Ranked No. 1 of the top 50 Tag Teams in the PWI Tag Team 50 in 2022 * Rolling Stone ** Tag Team of the Year (2017) * Wrestling Observer Newsletter ** Feud of the Year (2023) * WWE ** WWE (Raw) Tag Team Championship (3 times) ** WWE SmackDown Tag Team Championship (5 times) ** André the Giant Memorial Battle Royal (2021) – Jey Uso ** Slammy Award (2 times) *** Tag Team of the Year (2014, 2015) ==Footnotes== ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1985 births Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from San Francisco Category:Twin people from the United States Category:WWE teams and stables Category:WWE wrestlers
title: The Usos
